statements: DELETE FROM investment_opportunities WHERE opportunity_id = 100 AND opportunity_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date < '2023-01-01' AND price > 100.00
DELETE FROM investment_opportunities WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' AND trend_score < 0.5 AND potential_return > 10.00
DELETE FROM InvestmentOpportunities WHERE opportunity_type = 'Long-Term' AND investment_amount > 10000;
DELETE FROM stock_recommendations WHERE stock_id IN (SELECT stock_id FROM stocks WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL');
